briefdescription.para: select a different prefix for underscore

make the code below compatible with browsers without an installed firebug like debugger if (!window.console || !console.firebug) { var names = ["log", "debug", "info", "warn", "error", "assert", "dir", "dirxml", "group", "groupEnd", "time", "timeEnd", "count", "trace", "profile", "profileEnd"]; window.console = {}; for (var i = 0; i < names.length; ++i) window.console[names[i]] = function() {}; }

detaileddescription.para: small helper function to urldecode strings

briefdescription.para: small helper function to urlencode strings

memberdef.name: getQueryParameters

briefdescription.para: This function returns the parsed url parameters of the current request.

detaileddescription.para: Multiple values per key are supported, it will always return arrays of strings for the value parts.

memberdef.name: highlightText

briefdescription.para: highlight a given string on a jquery object by wrapping it in span elements with the given class name.
Small JavaScript module for the documentation.
